sentences.en: Even in his dotage, the Professor still sits on the committee.
sentences.cn: 即便上了年纪，教授仍然是委员会的一员。

sentences.en: He also served on the National Front's national executive committee.
sentences.cn: 他还曾就职于民族阵线全国执行委员会。

sentences.en: He had been on the Nobel Prize committee's list of possibles.
sentences.cn: 他在诺贝尔委员会列出的获奖候选者名单之列.

sentences.en: He sits on the executive committee that manages Lloyds.
sentences.cn: 他是管理劳埃德保险公司的执行委员会成员。

sentences.en: My reasons were stated in writing and circulated to all committee members.
sentences.cn: 我提出的几个理由以书面形式呈现，在所有委员会成员中传阅。

sentences.en: The committee have tried dozens of different ways to smoke him out.
sentences.cn: 为了揭发他，委员会尝试过几十种不同的方法。

sentences.en: The committee held its founding congress in the capital, Riga.
sentences.cn: 委员会在首都里加召开了成立大会。

sentences.en: The committee is concerned about players' behaviour, especially arguing with referees.
sentences.cn: 委员会很关注运动员的行为，特别是与裁判争吵的行为。

sentences.en: The committee is stacked with members from energy-producing states.
sentences.cn: 该委员会中安插进了几位来自能源生产州的成员。

sentences.en: The committee ruled against all-night opening mainly on safety grounds.
sentences.cn: 委员会反对通宵营业主要是出于安全方面的考虑。

sentences.en: The committee's confrontational style of campaigning has made it unpopular.
sentences.cn: 委员会咄咄逼人的宣传方式使其不得人心。

sentences.en: The declaration was drafted by a committee chaired by Dr Robert Song.
sentences.cn: 宣言由罗伯特·桑博士领导的委员会起草。

sentences.en: The Governor will appear before the committee next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 下周二，州长将接受委员会的质询。

sentences.en: The special cabinet committee comprises Mr Brown, Mr Mandelson, and Mr Straw.
sentences.cn: 特别内阁委员会包括布朗先生、曼德尔森先生和斯特劳先生。

sentences.en: Today its executive committee voted unanimously to reject the proposals.
sentences.cn: 今天执行委员会投票一致否决了这些提案。

phrases.tran_cn: 伦理委员会；道德委员会
奥委会；奥林匹克运动委员会
计划委员会；规划委员会
特别委员会，专门委员会

trans.tran_en: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc
